data.title: Princess of Wales Community Hospital, Bromsgrove
data.meta_site_name: Herefordshire and Worcestershire Health and Care NHS Trust
data.text:
General enquiries/hospital switchboard: 01527 488000

If you would like to speak with Fay Hildred, Matron please call 01527 488030.

Address: Princess of Wales Community Hospital, Stourbridge Road, Bromsgrove, Worcestershire, B61 0BB. View map and directions on Google.

Visiting times: Find out more about our current appointment and visiting guidance.

General information: View patient 'Welcome Pack'

Lickey Ward - A 24 bedding ward, supporting patients requiring continued care after a stay in an acute hospital. The ward has a particular focus on rehabilitation and frailty.

Cottage Ward - A 28 bedded ward that completes assessments and rehabilitation of the older person with varying health and care needs. The ward aims to support a timely discharge by completing and carrying out therapy led assessments with nursing care intervention to facilitate a smooth discharge process.
